name: Adas Anti-Synthetic Rifle
notes: Deals and additional 1d6 damage to synthetic targets.
npcHit: deals half of the damage roll as lightning damage to 1 additional creature within 2m of the target. Deals an additional 1d6 damage to synthetic targets.

name: Chakram Launcher
notes: Use a bonus action to charge the weapon before firing, consuming 2 heat. On a hit, it deals an additional 1d8 piercing and 2d4 thunder damage.

name: Collector Assault Rifle
notes: The Collector Assault Rifle does not use thermal clips. Instead use a d8 to track the "heat". Whenever you make a ranged attack with the weapon, spin down the die 1 face. Every round that you don't fire the weapon, spin the die up 1 face. This represents the weapon internally cooling off. If you ever spin down the die to 0, the weapon jams and cannot be fired again this combat.

name: Geth Pulse Rifle
notes: Deals radiant damage.

name: M-37 Falcon
notes: Instead of making a ranged weapon attack, the target makes a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + DEX modifier). Do not add your DEX modifier to a Double Tap atttack. If you are proficient with Assault Rifles, add your proficiency bonus to the DC. On a failed save, the target takes 1d8 thunder damage, or half as much on a successful one.

name: M-7 Lancer
notes: Somewhat of a relic and hard to come by, the M-7 does not use thermal clips. Instead use a d8 to track the "heat". Whenever you make a ranged attack with the weapon, spin down the die 1 face. Every round that you don't fire the weapon, spin the die up 2 faces. This represents the weapon internally cooling off. If you ever spin down the die to 0, the weapon jams and cannot be fired again this combat. It cannot benefit from Magazine mods.

name: M-99 Saber
notes: Custom made for its owner, when you purchase this weapon, you may choose one of the following: Increase damage of this weapon to d8,  reloading this weapon is a bonus action, or +2 on ranged attack rolls made with the weapon.

name: N7 Typhoon
notes: AC +1 when holding this weapon.

name: Particle Rifle
notes: The Particle Rifle does not use thermal clips. Instead use a d6 to track the "heat". Whenever you make a ranged attack with the weapon, spin down the die 1 face. Every round that you don't fire the weapon, spin the die up 1 face. This represents the weapon internally cooling off. If you ever spin down the die to 0, the weapon jams and cannot be fired again this combat. Deals radiant damage.

name: Striker Assault Rifle
notes: After making a ranged attack with the Striker, you may choose to enter the {targeting} condition. At the start of your next turn, all ranged attacks made with the Striker deal an additional 1d12 damage, at the cost of 2 heat per attack. This bonus continues to stack at the start of your turn until the targeting condition ends or until the Striker must be reloaded. For example, the 3rd round would deal 3d12 for 3 heat per attack, etc.

name: Acolyte
notes: Deals force damage. Damage done by this weapon cannot be reduced by using barrier ticks. Use a bonus action to charge the weapon before firing, consuming 2 heat. On a hit, it deals an additional 2d6 force damage.
npcHit: the target cannot use barrier ticks to reduce the attack damage.

name: Arc Pistol
notes: Use a bonus action to charge the weapon before firing, consuming 2 heat. On a hit, it deals an additional 2d6 lightning damage.
npcHit: deals half of the damage roll as lightning damage to 1 additional creature within 2m of the target.

name: Scorpion
notes: Deals thunder damage. Missed shots adhere to nearby surfaces and do 1d4 thunder damage instead to the target instead.

name: Cobra Missile Launcher
notes: Choose a creature within 60m that you can see and begin Targeting. At the start of your turn, if are still Targeting, you fire a missile that deals 8d12 thunder damage.

name: Geth Spitfire
notes: Release a torrent of bullets in a sweeping arc in front of you until the start of your next turn. You are considered to be Targeting until the start of your next turn. Creatures that enter or move within a 10m cone in front of you make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 12d4 piercing damage. On a success, a creature takes half damage. Each turn uses a charge.

name: M-451 Firestorm
notes: Sweep fire across the battlefield. Creatures within a 6m cone must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 13). On a failed save, a creature takes 4d6 fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful one.

name: M-560 Hydra
notes: Choose a creature within 60m that you can see and begin Targeting. At the start of your turn, if are still Targeting, fire a unique missile at the target. When the missile hits, it deploys 3 shaped charges. The first disrupts any barriers or shields, completely removing all barrier ticks and shield points. The second charge cripples armor; the creature has their AC reduced by 3 for the remainder of combat. The final charge deals explodes and the creature must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 18). On a failed save the creature takes 4d12 thunder damage or half as much on a successful one.

name: M-597 Landon
notes: Spend a round Targeting as you sweep the battlefield for all enemies. At the start of your next turn, if you are still targeting, choose up to 10 enemy creatures and launch a miniature missile at them, dealing 4d8 thunder damage. You cannot target a creature twice. Each missile used consumes a weapon charge.

name: M-920 Cain
notes: Spend a round Targeting, charging up the Cain's core. At the start of your turn, if you are still Targeting, you can choose to continue Targeting to increase the power of the blast. You can continue Targeting as long as the Cain has weapon charges left. When you're ready to release the blast, choose a fixed point within 60m. You release a small nuclear explosion in the area. Roll X + 5d12 where X is the number of charges you use multiplied by 2. Any creature within 2m automatically fails the saving throw. Creatures within 10m make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes radiant damage equal to your roll. On a success, a creature takes half damage.

name: ML-77 Missile Launcher
notes: Choose a creature within 60m that you can see and fire a missile at it. Each creature within a 4m cube of the target, including the target, must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw (DC 14). On a failed save a creature takes 39 (6d12) thunder damage or half as much on a successful one.

name: Reaper Blackstar
notes: Choose a creature within 60m that you can see and begin Targeting that creature. At the start of your turn, if you are still Targeting, fire a sub-atomic particle beam at the creature dealing 15d10 necrotic damage.

name: Sync Laser
notes: Spend a round Targeting a 10m x 20m rectangle, up to 60m away. At the start of your turn, if you are still targeting, call down an orbital strike. Creatures within the rectangle make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 8d12 thunder damage. On a success, a creature takes half damage.

name: Asari Huntress Sword
notes: Kinetic energy from successful melee attacks grant a minor biotic boost. When you hit with an attack using this weapon, as a bonus action, you may cast a biotic cantrip.
npcHit: the attacker may cast a biotic cantrip as a bonus action.

name: Kahjean Venom Dagger
notes: When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.
npcHit: the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

name: Krogan Warhammer
notes: When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC = 8+Proficiency Bonus+ Strength modifier) or is knocked prone. If wielded by a Krogan or another creature with a minimum Strength ability score of 18, this weapon becomes Versatile (1d12 for single-handed)
npcHit: the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC 13) or is knocked {prone}.

name: Omni-Blade
notes: Drawing the Omni-Blade is a free action. Having this weapon equipped does not require a weapon slot.

name: Omni-Hammer
notes: Drawing the Omni-Hammer is a free action. Having this weapon equipped does not require a weapon slot.

name: Omni-Taser
notes: Drawing the Omni-Taser is a free action. Having this weapon equipped does not require a weapon slot.

name: Omni-Torch
notes: Drawing the Omni-Torch is a free action. Having this weapon equipped does not require a weapon slot.

name: Omni-Whip
notes: Drawing the Omni-Whip is a free action. Having this weapon equipped does not require a weapon slot.

name: Riot Shield
notes: +2 AC

name: Sawblade
notes: When you hit an organic target with an attack, it takes an additional 2d6 damage at the start of its turn due to blood loss (this damage bypasses shields).
npcHit: if the target is organic, it takes an additional 7 (2d6) damage at the start of its next turn due to blood loss (this damage bypasses shields).

name: Stun Baton
notes: When you hit with an attack using this weapon, the target takes and additional 1d4 lightning damage. If the target maintaining a concentration spell, it automatically fails its saving throw to maintain that spell.
npcHit: the target takes 2 (1d4) lightning damage. If the target is maintaining a concentration spell, it automatically fails its saving throw to maintain that spell.

name: AT-12 Raider
tags: Two-handed, Hip Fire, Double Tap, Recoil

name: Disciple
notes: Deals bludgeoning damage. On a hit, the target must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 8) or becomes {stunned}.
npcHit: the target must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 8) or becomes {stunned}

name: Geth Plasma Shotgun
notes: Deals radiant damage. Use a bonus action to charge the weapon before firing, consumig 2 heat. On a hit, it deals an additional 2d10 radiant damage.

name: Graal Spike Thrower
notes: When you hit an organic target with an attack, it takes an additional 2d6 damage at the start of its turn due to blood loss (this damage bypasses shields).
npcHit: if the target is organic, it takes an additional 7 (2d6) damage at the start of its next turn due to blood loss (this damage bypasses shields).

name: M-27 Scimitar
tags: Two-handed, Hip Fire, Double Tap, Recoil

name: N7 Crusader
tags: Two-handed, Hip Fire, Double Tap, Heavy, Recoil

name: N7 Piranha
notes: When fired make a single attack roll against all creatures in a 4m cone. All creatures with AC less than the attack are hit.

name: Reegar Carbine
npcHit: deals half of the damage roll  as lightning damage to 1 additional creature within 2m of the target.

name: Venom Shotgun
notes: Deals thunder damage. Use a bonus action to charge the weapon before firing, consumig 2 heat. It deals an additional  2d10 thunder damage. Instead of making a ranged weapon attack, target a creature that makes a Dexterity saving throw (DC13). On a successful save, it takes half as much damage.

name: Blood Pack Punisher
notes: +1 to hit targets within normal range

name: Collector SMG
notes: The Collector SMG does not use thermal clips. Instead use a d6 to track the "heat". Whenever you make a ranged attack with the weapon, spin down the die 1 face. Every round that you don't fire the weapon, spin the die up 1 face. This represents the weapon internally cooling off. If you ever spin down the die to 0, the weapon jams and cannot be fired again this combat.

name: Geth Plasma SMG
notes: Deals radiant damage.

name: M-25 Hornet
tags: Double Tap, Hip Fire, Burst Fire, Light

name: Black Widow
notes: Ignores half cover. On a hit, if the target is not behind cover, it takes an additional 1d4 damage.
npcHit: if the target is not behind cover, it takes and additional 1d4 damage.

name: Javelin
notes: Ignores half and three-quarters cover

name: Kishock Harpoon Gun
notes: A target hit by this weapon makes a Constitution (DC 13) saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes an additional 3d6 damage at the start of their turn due to blood loss (this damage bypasses shields).
npcHit: the target makes a Constitution (DC 13) saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes an additional 10 (3d6) damage at the start of their turn due to blood loss. (this damage bypasses shields)

name: Krysae Sniper Rifle
notes: +2 damage to synthorganic enemies

name: M-97 Viper
notes: You can reload this weapon as a bonus action.

name: M-98 Widow
notes: Ignores half cover. On a hit, if the target is not behind cover, it takes an additional 1d4 damage.
npcHit: if the target is not behind cover, it takes and additional 1d4 damage.

name: Collector Sniper Rifle
notes: The Collector Sniper Rifle does not use thermal clips. Instead use a d4 to track the "heat". Whenever you make a ranged attack with the weapon, spin down the die 1 face. Every round that you don't fire the weapon, spin the die up 1 face. This represents the weapon internally cooling off. If you ever spin down the die to 0, the weapon jams and cannot be fired again this combat.
